price: Na lau kuwa wangeli ingiliwa kwa pande zote, kisha wakatakiwa kufanya khiana, wangeli fanya, na wasingeli sita ila kidogo tu.
arabic: وَلَوۡ دُخِلَتۡ عَلَيۡهِم مِّنۡ أَقۡطَارِهَا ثُمَّ سُئِلُواْ ٱلۡفِتۡنَةَ لَأٓتَوۡهَا وَمَا تَلَبَّثُواْ بِهَآ إِلَّا يَسِيرٗا
footnotes: Lau kuwa makundi ya majeshi ya maadui wangeli waingilia Madina kwa kila upande, na wakawataka watangaze kuwa wameuwacha Uislamu na wawapige vita Waislamu bila ya shaka wangeli wakubalia yale waliyo takiwa, na wala wasingeli sita ila muda mfupi tu.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: walaw dukhilat ʿalayhim min aqṭārihā thumma su-ilū al-fit'nata laātawhā wamā talabbathū bihā illā yasīran
